SEARCH

Package org.opensearch.sdk.api

package org.opensearch.sdk.api
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description

    org.opensearch.sdk.action

  • Class
    Description
    ActionExtension
    An additional extension point for Extensions that extends OpenSearch's scripting functionality.
    ActionExtension.ActionHandler<Request extends org.opensearch.action.ActionRequest,Response extends org.opensearch.action.ActionResponse>
    Class responsible for handing Transport Actions
    AnalysisExtension
    OpenSearch doesn't have any automatic mechanism to share these components between indexes.
    CircuitBreakerExtension
    An extension point for Extension implementations to add custom circuit breakers
    EngineExtension
    A Extension that provides alternative engine implementations.
    ExtensibleExtension
    An extension point for Extension implementations to be themselves extensible.
    ExtensibleExtension.ExtensionLoader
    Extension point for external Extensions to be extendable
    IndexStoreExtension
    An extension that provides alternative directory implementations.
    IndexStoreExtension.DirectoryFactory
    An interface that describes how to create a new directory instance per shard.
    IndexStoreExtension.RecoveryStateFactory
    An interface that allows to create a new RecoveryState per shard.
    IndexStoreExtension.RemoteDirectoryFactory
    An interface that describes how to create a new remote directory instance per shard.
    IngestExtension
    An extension point for Extension implementations to add custom ingest processors
    MapperExtension
    An extension point for Extension implementations to add custom mappers
    PersistentTaskExtension
    Extension for registering persistent tasks executors.
    ReloadableExtension
    An extension point for Extensions that can be reloaded.
    RepositoryExtension
    An extension point for Extension implementations to add custom snapshot repositories.
    ScriptExtension
    An additional extension point for Extensions that extends OpenSearch's scripting functionality.
    SearchExtension
    Extension for extending search time behavior.
    SearchExtension.AggregationSpec
    Specification for an Aggregation.
    SearchExtension.CompositeAggregationSpec
    Specification for including an aggregation as a part of Composite Aggregation.
    SearchExtension.ExecutorServiceProvider
    Executor service provider
    SearchExtension.FetchPhaseConstructionContext
    Context available during fetch phase construction.
    SearchExtension.PipelineAggregationSpec
    Specification for a PipelineAggregator.
    SearchExtension.QuerySpec<T extends org.opensearch.index.query.QueryBuilder>
    Specification of custom Query.
    SearchExtension.RescorerSpec<T extends org.opensearch.search.rescore.RescorerBuilder<T>>
    Specification for a RescorerBuilder.
    SearchExtension.ScoreFunctionSpec<T extends org.opensearch.index.query.functionscore.ScoreFunctionBuilder<T>>
    Specification of custom ScoreFunction.
    SearchExtension.SearchExtensionSpec<W extends org.opensearch.common.io.stream.NamedWriteable,P>
    Specification of search time behavior extension like a custom MovAvgModel or ScoreFunction.
    SearchExtension.SearchExtSpec<T extends org.opensearch.search.SearchExtBuilder>
    Specification for a SearchExtBuilder which represents an additional section that can be parsed in a search request (within the ext element).
    SearchExtension.SignificanceHeuristicSpec<T extends org.opensearch.search.aggregations.bucket.terms.heuristic.SignificanceHeuristic>
    Specification of custom SignificanceHeuristic.
    SearchExtension.SortSpec<T extends org.opensearch.search.sort.SortBuilder<T>>
    Specification of custom Sort.
    SearchExtension.SuggesterSpec<T extends org.opensearch.search.suggest.SuggestionBuilder<T>>
    Specification for a Suggester.
    SystemIndexExtension
    Extension for defining system indices.
